chapter.text: Without hesitation, the monster slowly walks into the room and turns to look right at you. ^1500You squeeze further back under the desk, hoping it didnâ€™t notice you. ^1500You jump at the sound of a loud crash. ^1500You peek out to see the origin of the noise and see the monster with its fist through a computer screen. ^1500It yanks out a handful of wires and turns to you again. ^1500The monster grabs the computer monitor with its opposite hand and launches it at you. ^1500You snap your head back to dodge it, but smack the back of your head against the wall behind you.
